{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = ADSL Home Gateway |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = T-Com |model = Speedport W700V |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, dsl modem, analog phone gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = ARV4528KW |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Infineon (Lantiq);PSB 50505;AMAZON-ME (PSB 50505 E V1.3); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 4KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 235 <!-- 235 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Eon;EN29LV320B-70TCP; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = PSC;A2V28S40CTP-G6; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Infineon;ADM6996I; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:12:BF |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = SuperTask!;;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = 0000 |defaultssid = WLAN-mac |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = ARV4528 |manuf_rev = KW |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2008 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR2413A; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR5212; |rad1chip3 = Atheros;AR5112; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :aka ''Speedport W 700V''
Supported DSL standards: :ADSL2 = G.992.3, ADSL2+ = G.992.5, ADSL=G.992.1 This device would appear to be using the ''SuperTask!'' RTOS.
===Specifications=== *[http://www.kessler-design.com/speedport-w700v/hardware.html ''Speedport W700V'' Hardware on '''Kessler-Design'''] ([https://i.imgur.com/WeJ33_d.webp?maxwidth=640 PCB]) :• CPU: [[Infineon]] Amazon ADSL2+ (MIPS 4KEc Hard IP Core) ::(OpenSSL 0.9.6a Crypto library, SSL/TLS Library ::and CCL/ITRI VoIP Middleware SIP, SIPTX, UAcore) :• WLAN: [[Atheros]] AR2413 Single-Chip MAC/Baseband/Radio :: [[Atheros]] AR5212 Multiprotocol MAC/Baseband Processor :: [[Atheros]] AR5112 Dual Band Radio-on-a-Chip (RoC) :• VoIP: [[Infineon]] VINETIC-2CPE Voice Processor/Analog Termination :: [[Infineon]] SLIC-DC Ringing SLIC with Integrated DC/DC Convertor :: [[Infineon]] ISDN ST Transceiver on a Single Chip :• Switch: [[Infineon]] ADM6996 ''Samurai'' (5+1 port 10/100)
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.telekom.de/dlp/eki/downloads/Speedport/Speedport_W700V/bedanl_speedport_w700v_08.2006.pdf Manual]
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== {{/Serial info}}
==See also== ===OEM=== :;[https://www.wifi-libre.com/topic-1333-listado-de-routers-suministrados-por-companias-en-espana.html ISP Tables] :[[Arcadyan]] ARV4528KW-A-LF-LT • [[SMC SMC7908voWBRA]] :[[Arcadyan]] ARV4528KW-B-LF-90A (DT) • :[[Arcadyan]] ARV4518HW-A-B7 • [[SMC SMC7908VoWBRA2]] :[[Arcadyan]] ARV4518PW-A-LF-LT • [[SMC]] SMC7908A-ISP :[[Arcadyan]] ARV7518PW (IAD3) • Atheros AR9223 :[[Arcadyan]] AR4505KW-A-LF-LT • [[SMC]] SMC7904WBRA ([[Realtek]] RTL8671) :[[Arcadyan]] AR4505NW • [[SMC SMC7904WBRA2]] ([[TI]] TNETW1350A) :[[Arcadyan]] AR7505QW1-A-LF-17 • [[SMC SMC7904WBRA-N]] ([[Infineon]])
===Models=== *[[T-Com Speedport W500V]] • Tecom (Targa WR500 VoIP) *[[T-Com Speedport W700V]] • [[Arcadyan]] ARV4528KW <!-- SMC SMC7908voWBRA (Arcadyan ARV4528KW-A-LF-LT) --> *[[T-Com Speedport W701V]] • [[AVM]] (Telekom) <!-- [[AVM FRITZ!Box Fon WLAN 7124]] --> *[[T-Com Speedport W723V Typ A]] • [[Askey]] RTV1645VW *[[T-Com Speedport W723V Typ B]] • [[Arcadyan]] VGV8539 *[[T-Com Speedport W724V Typ B]]
